name: Keepy Uppy (penguinhedgehog)
description:
Keepy Uppy - a game about staying in the air for as long as possible!

Use the left and right arrow keys to navigate mid air and land on the red balls to stay airbone.

Instructions. Download "Keepy Uppy.zip" and extract files. Run "Keepy Uppy.exe"

Short Prototype of a game done for ScoreSpace Jam #22!
